ch.iserver.ace.collaboration
Interface ParticipantSessionCallback

All Superinterfaces:
SessionCallback
All Known Implementing Classes:
ParticipantSessionCallbackImpl
public interface ParticipantSessionCallback
extends SessionCallback

The ParticipantSessionCallback extends the SessionCallback interface and adds methods used only for sessions in which the local user is a participant.

Method Summary
 void kicked()
          Called to notify the document controller that the local user has been kicked out of the session.
 void sessionTerminated()
          Called to notify the document controller that the session was terminated, that is the publisher closed the document.
 void setDocument(PortableDocument doc)
          Sets the document content to the given doc.
 
Methods inherited from interface ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.SessionCallback
getLock, participantJoined, participantLeft, receiveCaretUpdate, receiveOperation, sessionFailed, setParticipantId
 

Method Detail

setDocument

Sets the document content to the given doc.

Parameters:
doc - the new document content

sessionTerminated

void sessionTerminated()
Called to notify the document controller that the session was terminated, that is the publisher closed the document.

kicked

void kicked()
Called to notify the document controller that the local user has been kicked out of the session.
